indication: Staging of known non-small cell lung cancer
content:
Findings:
Lung Mass: Hypermetabolic mass in the left upper lobe, SUV max 12.5, consistent with known primary tumor.
Mediastinal Lymph Nodes: Hypermetabolic lymph nodes in the subcarinal region (SUV max 6.8), suggestive of metastatic involvement.
Distant Metastasis: No hypermetabolic lesions identified in the liver, adrenal glands, bones, or brain to suggest distant metastases.
Background Activity: Physiological tracer uptake in other organs.

Impression:
Hypermetabolic primary lung tumor in the left upper lobe.
Suspicious mediastinal lymph nodes, likely metastatic.
No evidence of distant metastatic disease.
